alert.note: Alert for Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:09AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Randolph, northwestern Lawrence and east central Sharp Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Hardy, or 12 miles southeast of Mammoth Spring, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocahontas... Imboden... Ravenden... Reyno... Maynard... Biggers... O`Kean... Ravenden Springs... Dalton... Attica... Williford... Middlebrook... Ingram... Shannon... Birdell... Elnora... Elkins Park... Brakebill... Warm Springs... Eleven Point... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
